commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Ahem. We will now begin the first "Who Knows School Idols the Best Tournament"!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Urgh, I don't like competition. But today, I can't afford to lose!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: M-Me neither!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I love school idols so much I came to Japan. I can't lose here!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I've defeated Maki in a similar contest before. I'm going to win again today!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Er, why are we doing this again?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Come on, Kanata, were you dozing off again? We were talking about going to have fun somewhere, remember? And no one could decide on one thing to do.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: So the people who wanted to belt it all out in karaoke like Nico suggested came here.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: So...why are we having a competition all of a sudden?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: *Sigh* That would be a long story if we got into it.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Setsuna! You really showed Maki the ropes that time. But I would have definitely won!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: My, Nico, you're awfully confident, but when it comes to knowing this subject, I'm not going to lose!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Insolence! All right, I'll show you just how much knowledge I've got crammed into my head!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Now hold on a moment, you two. My Ruby isn't going to fall behind, either.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Eek! D-Dia... Um, I...

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: I-I'm a little confident here, too.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: What's with all of you?! Don't you know I'm the best here?!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Very well, then. Come, everyone, let us see who knows the most about school idols, once and for all!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Ahh, so this is something I've got no chance at, then? I'll just...take a nap, then. Zzz...

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: I won't let you sleep!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Eep?!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: You and I have the critical role of selecting the songs and judging the results!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Wahh!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Now then, Kanata, play the songs as written here. Ruby, I believe in you! Take it home!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Uwahhh.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Well, here goes. First one, staaaaart.

commands.speaker: Emma, Nico, Setsuna
commands.line: M-

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Me, me! This is Big Love Brain by the Kochi school idol group Zeyo Zeyo☆All Right!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Correct!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: N-Not bad, Hanayo.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: No fair, I knew that one!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Ahhh, I was so close!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Hm? Ruby, you're kinda shaking a lot. You okay? Too cold in here? Need me to turn up the heat?

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: E-Everyone's just so into it I can't say a thing!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Ruby, you must do your best. No one loves school idols more than you, correct?

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: You're right, Dia! All right, I'll do my Rubesty!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: That's the spirit! Now then, Kanata, give us the second song!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: All right, here's the second song! Staaart!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Me, me! Th-This is the song Shisa from the Okinawan school idol group Kurusa!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Correct! Good job, Ruby!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Yeah! Dia, I can do it!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: There you go. You can do it if you try. I knew you could--have more confidence.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Ahh, Diaaa!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: *Giggle* Look at that sisterly love. Now I miss my brothers and sisters, too!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: *Yawn* Now I wanna see Haruka, too!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Wh-Why's the mood getting so sappy all of a sudden?! Now it doesn't feel like a competition at all!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Well, we know that we're all about as knowledgeable about school idols as each other, so do we even have to compete?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: You know, you're right. Like, we all started to answer at the same time!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: How about you guys all say you're number one?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Indeed, I would have no problem with that.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Yeah, we all love school idols!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Which is why we cannot let the School Idol Festival be canceled!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: It'll be all right! We can do anything if we put our heads together!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Yeah! Nico's right!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: If we, μ's, and Aqours all work together, this will definitely work out!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Let's all stand on the School Idol Festival stage together!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: That's right! No matter what went into canceling it, we'll do anything to make our dreams come true! C'mon, say it together! Nico-Nico-N--

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Rubesty!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Hey! I'm supposed to say the line here. Could you not steal my vibe?
